realEstate.description: Residential real estate is a type of property, containing either a single family or multifamily structure, that is available for occupation for non-business purposes.

testimonials.title: Feedbacks & Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our clients! Genuine feedback and experiences shared by those we've served.
testimonials.t1: Using Houzez was the best decision for listing my property. The platform was user-friendly and professional, and within a week, I had multiple serious buyers. Highly impressed with the exposure it brought!
testimonials.t2: Houzez made it incredibly easy for me to find a rental property near my university. The listings were accurate, the agents were responsive, and the whole experience felt seamless. I highly recommend it!
testimonials.t3: I was relocating for my research fellowship and needed a home fast. Houzez not only helped me search by budget and location but also connected me with verified agents. The platform saved me time and stress!
testimonials.t4: I wanted to invest in a small rental property, and Houzez provided me with detailed insights, clear pricing filters, and virtual tours. It’s a game-changer for first-time investors like me!
testimonials.t5: From shortlisting to closing the deal, Houzez was with me every step. The interface is clean, the support is top-notch, and the agents were all professional. Couldn't have asked for a better platform.

footer.aboutDescription: Our platform offers modern real estate tools for agents and designers — combining aesthetic design with ease of use.
footer.newsletterDescription: Stay up to date with the latest listings & news.
